svc@... wrote:

> I have done some research into the libraries bundled with Heritrix, and in
> some cases newer libraries exist:
>
> POI: Version 2.0-RC1-20031102 is in the bundle,
> but POI exists now in version 2.5.1-final
> (http://tomcat.edu.brock.dk/apache/jakarta/poi/release/bin/) 
> <http://tomcat.edu.brock.dk/apache/jakarta/poi/release/bin/%29>
>
> jasper-compiler/jasper-runtime: Tomcat 4.1.31 is released (September 16,
> 2004).
> The jasper-x jar-files should be taken from this distribution
> http://apache-mirror.dkuug.dk/jakarta/tomcat-4/v4.1.31/
>
> itext: itext is now in version 1.2.1
> (http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=15255&package_id=12596&release_id=296145) 
> <http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=15255&package_id=12596&release_id=296145%29>
>
> commons-net: commons-net is now in version 1.3.0
> (http://apache-mirror.dkuug.dk/jakarta/commons/net/binaries/) 
> <http://apache-mirror.dkuug.dk/jakarta/commons/net/binaries/%29>

Thanks for the above S�ren (I've made an RFE to upgrade the above).

>
> Finally. I've noticed that
> commons-collections exists twice in the Heritrix-bundle: Both version 2.1
> and 3.1 of commons-collection.
> Is that necessary?

CVS doesn't have the two libs but they were both showing up in our 
continuous builds because of cruft over on our build server.  Fixed.  
Thanks for pointing it out,

St.Ack
